blogPost.title: How can diversity in leadership change the way we work? Answer by @dojiboy9, Co-Founder & CEO @forethought_ai. https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/6MzVWHIXKt
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 领导力的多样性如何改变我们的工作方式？回答者：@dojiboy9，联合创始人&amp；CEO @forethought_ai。https://t.co/TqZcEysz49 https://t.co/6MzVWHIXKt。

previous.title: How can one maintain hope in the face of oppression? Answer by @FlemingPhD, Professor of Sociology and Africana Studies at Stony Brook. https://t.co/ClA7w7WnKV https://t.co/Eab5nXg7OZ

localize.full_text: 面对压迫，如何保持希望？由石溪分校社会学和非洲研究教授@FlemingPhD回答。https://t.co/ClA7w7WnKV https://t.co/Eab5nXg7OZ。
